formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'DUNDILOOKUP' =-
[Syntax] DUNDILOOKUP(number[|context[|options]])
[Synopsis] Do a DUNDi lookup of a phone number.
[Description] This will do a DUNDi lookup of the given phone number. If no context is given, the default will be e164. The result of this function will the Technology/Resource found in the DUNDi lookup. If no results were found, the result will be blank. If the 'b' option is specified, the internal DUNDi cache will be bypassed.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ [Description] This will do a DUNDi lookup of the given phone number. If no context is given, the default will be e164. The result of - this function will the Technology/Resource found in the DUNDi - lookup. If no results were found, the result will be blank. + this function will return the Technology/Resource found in the first result + in the DUNDi lookup. If no results were found, the result will be blank. If the 'b' option is specified, the internal DUNDi cache will be bypassed.
